title: #053 - Lessons From Losing 300 Followers
itunes:title: #053 - Lessons From Losing 300 Followers
description: This week I’m talking all about how I lost 300 followers, and what my biggest takeaways and lessons were from the experience. Having shared this earlier intimately with my VIP List I realized what a hot topic it was and decided to record a whole episode on it. Take a listen & I’d love to know your thoughts below!

Having shared this earlier intimately with my VIP List I realized what a hot topic it was and decided to record a whole episode on it. Take a listen & I’d love to know your thoughts below!
